Subtitle: Together, design your project
Introduction section 1: As a landscape designer, I worked for public and private partners. I will help you for all your landscaping projects. Together, we will build your project, then, I will show you the render in several formats : photomontage, drawing, plan, 3D view, plant pallet. So, you will have a complete folder, giving you a global overview of your project.
Professional Text: If there isn't any ladnscape design in your company, and you have the will to show a structured and visual project to your customers, I offer you my services. We will work together with the aim of building a complete file :
Private Text: Do you want to landscape your garden ? You are looking for ideas ? I'm here to support you for the design of this living space. With a customized follow-up, we will build your project. Once the file finalized :
Private Text Elem 1: I will looking for the most attractive companies, and I will ask for an estimate of costs.
Private Text Elem 3: I will provide you support to do the realization yourself.
Diagnostic Text: I analyze the existing land and his constraints. I take into account your desires and your needs, to create a garden going beyond your expectations.
Project Text: Thanks to several medias ( plans, photomontages, etc. ) you will visualize directly your project, and get a better apprehension of this new space.
Advice Text: I will help you to choose the plants, in order to keep the project well adapted to the climate, and I will guide you to select the best materials to build a harmonious space.
Resume Text 1: With the professional degree 'Landscape designer, with infography option', I first work as draughtswoman for public projects in Normandie.
Resume Text 2: Then  I moved to Les Alpes maritimes where I worked as draughtswoman but also as landscape worker. This experience allow me to develop my technical knowledges.
Resume Text 3: With this expertise, I decided to create Graphite Paysage to have more challenges to deal with, and support you in every aspects of your project.
Want to say hello: Want to talk about your project ?
Slider Tips: You can move the cursor to see the before / after effect
